analysis.description: FreezableToken.toKey (/unique_chucks/23/0x0682c57e3b81556a05704279d83d4843ae739d43.sol#320-330) is declared view but contains assembly code

FreezableToken.releaseOnce (/unique_chucks/23/0x0682c57e3b81556a05704279d83d4843ae739d43.sol#286-310) uses timestamp for comparisons
	Dangerous comparisons:
	- require(bool)(uint64(block.timestamp) > head) (/unique_chucks/23/0x0682c57e3b81556a05704279d83d4843ae739d43.sol#291-292)

FreezableToken.releaseAll (/unique_chucks/23/0x0682c57e3b81556a05704279d83d4843ae739d43.sol#310-319) uses timestamp for comparisons
	Dangerous comparisons:
	- release != 0 && block.timestamp > release (/unique_chucks/23/0x0682c57e3b81556a05704279d83d4843ae739d43.sol#315-318)

FreezableToken.freeze (/unique_chucks/23/0x0682c57e3b81556a05704279d83d4843ae739d43.sol#331-368) uses timestamp for comparisons
	Dangerous comparisons:
	- require(bool)(_until > block.timestamp) (/unique_chucks/23/0x0682c57e3b81556a05704279d83d4843ae739d43.sol#334-336)
